parameters.name: Codes
parameters.description: The codes of roles in the DataWorks workspace.

parameters.name: Names
parameters.description: The names of roles in the DataWorks workspace.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 10. Maximum value: 100.

parameters.name: ProjectId
parameters.description:
The DataWorks workspace ID. You can log on to the [DataWorks console](https://workbench.data.aliyun.com/console) and go to the Workspace page to query the ID.

You must configure this parameter to specify the DataWorks workspace to which the API operation is applied.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The type of the role. Valid values:

*   UserCustom: user-defined role
*   System: system role
